_sText:
Okay i made a remake of this bhop map, cuz the gameplay of the map is pretty (i think) and i just did so many mistakes the first time that i made it, cuz it was my first map in 6 years or so... So now i made a remake.

The fixes/changes/improvement:

- changed the speed and delay of every block.
- changed the textures to some better looking ones.
- changed the hight of the walls, cuz the old ones looked stupid.
- added some details to the walls, when entering a new lvl.
- fixed the bug on the lvl with the fire, it now NOT possible to complete that lvl by jumping on the fire things.
- added alot of brushes to func_detail
- added nodraw to the water (dont know if it help anything ^^)
- added 4 more player spawn (max players is now 20)
- "removed" the nasty GILF picture in the darkroom.
- added elites to the end 

------------

This remake will definitely be more playable than the last one... Enjoy guys !
